name: Pixel Bear Jumper
description:
Jump from platform to platform and collect fruit and coins to increase your score. Avoid dangerous obstacles such as spikes, bombs, and flying birds. Use the coins you've collected to unlock different bears in the menu. Reach a hi-score and unlock every kind of bear.

CONTROLS
- Press the Left/Right Arrow keys or A/D keys to move.
- Press Esc to pause the game.
